title: WipEout 2097 for Sega Saturn
material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM and manual in Sega Saturn case
brief_description: WipEout 2097 is set four decades after its predecessor. The F3600 anti-gravity racing competition from the first game has been replaced by an even faster and more dangerous tournament: the F5000 AG league. The racing and weapon use gameplay from the original WipEout remains the same. The main modes from have also returned, but with the addition of a new Challenge Modes. Completing challenges in this mode rewards the player with faster race speeds, new tracks, and new vehicles.
